content:
I don't have access to real-time information and updates about columbia university. however, like many other large institutions, emergencies have occurred in the past. 

for example, in 2005, a bomb threat was made at columbia university's campus, which resulted in the evacuation of four buildings. in 2010, there was a fire at the university's research facility which resulted in some injuries and damage. again, in 2018, a steam pipe exploded on campus, which led to the evacuation of several buildings, though no one was injured.

aside from these incidents, the university, as well as law enforcement officials, constantly strive to prepare and implement procedures to mitigate and prevent emergencies from occurring.
